snippet: A crowded boat capsized while trying to escape a cyclone bearing down on Myanmar, tossing dozens of Rohingya Muslims into the sea, the United Nations said Tuesday.
abstract: Overcrowded boat capsizes while trying to escape cyclone bearing down on Myanmar, tossing dozens of Rohingya Muslims into the sea; eight bodies are found and more than 50 people remain missing.
lead_paragraph: A crowded boat capsized while trying to escape a cyclone bearing down on Myanmar, tossing dozens of Rohingya Muslims into the sea, the United Nations said Tuesday.

headline.seo: Myanmar: Under Siege at Home, Refugees Are Feared Lost at Sea
headline.main: Myanmar: Under Siege at Home, Refugees Are Feared Lost at Sea
headline.print_headline: Myanmar: Under Siege at Home, Refugees Are Feared Lost at Sea
